plot: With the 2020 election underway, John Oliver explains how the Trump administration has handled asylum seekers over the past four years, why it matters, and what we can do about it.

John Oliver talks about the situation of asylum seekers in USA under Trump administration. He points out the three major changes (migrant protection protocols, safe third country agreements and title 42.) which are deciding the asylum seekers future.—Niaz Islam Arif
